column1: Flow ID,Name,Description,Test Steps,Flow Priority

1,Verify Successful Order Completion from PageHome to PageThankYou,"Navigate to the home page and select the desired product. Proceed to checkout, fill in the shipping details, and complete the order. Verify that the order is successfully completed on the thank you page.","Step 1: Navigate to https://cellphone-staging.aut.katalon.com/
Step 2: Hover over list item
Step 3: Click on link 'Apple' -> Navigate to page 'category/chekhly-na-iphone'
Step 4: Click on button
Step 5: Click on link '1'
Step 6: Proceed to checkout, fill shipping details, and complete order
